channel.title: New Pernix!
channel.description:
New Pernix models + INTS
If you need the ints converted for any PI I'll gladly convert :)
https://www.dropbox.com/s/ybqilvko7015vd5/pernix.rar
EDIT: Doesn't include Pernix gloves or boots as I couldn't find correct INTS for them :)

item.title: New Pernix!
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

Why do you guys say PI when referring to a client? PI is a server, not a client. Most PI’s use refactored/renamed clients. There is no such thing as a PI when referring to a client.

Read full topic

item.description:
@MrFun wrote:

Yambar:

Can you convert to PI please? Thanks~! ;D

class8.aStringArray189 = => itemDef.actions = class8.aStringArray189[1] = => itemDef.actions[1] = class8.anInt190 = => itemDef.modelRotation1 = class8.anInt198 = => itemDef.modelRotation2 = class8.anInt181 = => itemDef.modelZoom = class8.anInt169 = => itemDef.modelOffset1 = class8.aByteArray178 = => itemDef.description = class8.aString170 = => itemDef.name = class8.aBoolean176 = => itemDef.stackable = class8.anInt165 = => itemDef.maleEquip1 = class8.anInt200 = => itemDef.femaleEquip1 = class8.anInt204 = => itemDef.anInt204 = class8.anInt175 = => itemDef.anInt175 = class8.anInt197 = => itemDef.anInt197 = class8.anIntArray156 = => itemDef.originalModelColors = class8.anIntArray160 = => itemDef.modifiedModelColors = class8.anInt164 = => itemDef.maleEquip2 = class8.anInt188 = => itemDef.femaleEquip2 = class8.anInt194 = => itemDef.modelOffset2 = class8.anInt174 = => itemDef.modelID =
you do it

item.title: New Pernix!
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

squirt irl:

Proves my point exactly, BACK TO PI.

Not even close…

You all are stupid. With the exception of elve and badger, client side issues are not dependent on the server base. Project Insanity clients are (poorly) renamed, and Delta, most of them at least, are not renamed, that’s it.

OT: Why, JUST WHY, would you release this shit for more mopards to put into their lower revision servers?

Read full topic

lmao its easy to convert

Why flame then? I’ve never used Delta so I have no idea

what part of renaming some variables according to what they are named in a different client is even hard? the fact of the matter is you are too lazy to find it when its essentially right under your nose.
[/quote]
